summary: I'm enough of a sad loser that I'm considering just getting a Tony Stark action figure and commissioning someone to make Jack's...
body: I’m enough of a sad loser that I’m considering just getting a Tony Stark action figure and commissioning someone to make Jack’s outfit for him. It’s a close enough resemblance action figure wise but I thought I’d try and find out if there are any other characters with 12" action figures who could also stand in for Jack since the facial hair and other features aren’t exactly a perfect match. Anyone have any ideas hmhm? 🤔

summary: Y’all I’m taking a break from writing for a bit and I might not be on for a couple of days. I know it doesn’t seem like I was...
body:
Y’all I’m taking a break from writing for a bit and I might not be on for a couple of days. I know it doesn’t seem like I was writing as nothing has been updated but I promise I have been, I’m just taking my time to make sure everything is perfect, however I’m taking a break. My bisnonna (great grandmother) just died and obviously I am heartbroken. My bisnonna meant the world to me and I miss her so much already, and especially on thanksgiving to make matters worse. I’m glad I got to have her in my life for the almost 16 years I’ve been alive and I am so upset she won’t be here to see me turn 16. I may not post for a few days and I wont be writing for a while, I’m not so sure of how long. I hope you can all understand where I’m coming from so please, I beg of you don’t be mad. I just need some time to grieve and process this all. I hope you all can understand why I am doing this. I apologize again for any inconviences.

(P.S: I need some Tom Holland hugs)

tagging some mutuals to let them know:  @spideykisses @peters-vlogs @peter–man @hazhasmycoffee @teague-skarsgard @tomhollanduniverse @lovefrompeterparker @fangirlinganditswonders @marvelshawarmaeatters

title: A surprise for Loki
body:
[Thor enters Loki’s room and see him sitting on his bed visibly unhappy]

Thor: how are you today, my brother?

Loki: in a really bad mood…..

Thor: Why what happened? Did someone hurt your feelings? Who is it and I                shall kill them for you!

Loki: first tony steals my wine, then strange shoos me out the living room, and             now you’re bothering me! Can I just have some peace?!?….

[Thor slumps a little, but doesn’t say anything and leaves. in a few moments, peter comes in quietly and sits next too the god of mischief.]

Peter: Hey, mister Loki?  you can tell me what’s wrong…

Loki: nothings wrong, except…

[suddenly, the door bursts open and everyone comes in. Tony carrying a big chocolate cake, Stephan carrying bottles of wine and Champaign and the rest of the Avengers carrying boxes of all different sizes and shapes.]

Loki: guys what are you doing in my room?

Tony:we’re giving you a birthday surprise! SURPRISE!

Loki: thankyou so much….. no ones ever done that for me before….

[Loki starts to cry and peter gives him the biggest hug, while the rest of them help give him his presents. Loki still smiles when he thinks of this.] 


hi, panda here, just started my first ever blog, please follow and show support! thankyou, hope you like my posts!

summary:
Marvel years from now: great news! We’re recasting Tony Stark! 
Me, old and bitter: you kids will never know the true Tony...
body:
Marvel years from now: great news! We’re recasting Tony Stark!

Me, old and bitter: you kids will never know the true Tony Stark, The Robert Downey Jr™ a man so fit for the role most question if he ever even had a script. The grandfather of this nation and a true provider for his people. Legends only bitches

My grandkids probably: grandma this is the 5th time today please stop

blog.name: supersoldierfreak
blog.title: Devout Super Soldier Fan
blog.description: Hi, I'm Phee! | LOVE THE AVENGERS | Always up for a chat x | A jumble of posts | Requests Closed | Masterlist x

body:
Arachnophobia

Hi!

A small back story to this: when Steve found him, Bucky insisted on finding you as you were his partner at HYDRA and meant the world to him.

It had been two months since you had been moved to the tower and settling in hadn’t been easy. Bucky, of course, had been your light at the end of the tunnel through everything and making you realise that things could get better if you tried.

Stark and Barton had recently engaged in their monthly prank wars, which on this occasion involved almost the whole team. The intelligent members of the team (you, Natasha, Bruce and Bucky) were smartly staying out of the mess although as Bucky had discovered last time, that didn’t mean you were safe.

You rolled out of bed and pulled on a black tank top and leggings before going to brew your mandatory morning coffee. Natasha gave you an assassin smile in greeting and you returned it. You ignored everyone else in favour of grabbing your favourite mug that Bucky had given you. Indistinguishable whispering was coming from Tony and normally you would have a gun raised to his head but this life was different; you weren’t in constant danger anymore. You hit the toggle on the kettle and reached for the cupboard with the coffee in. You opened the cupboard as you checked your phone, tapping out a reply to an email from… You felt multiple things land on your arm causing you to drop your phone onto the side.

Spiders of varying sizes were crawling up your arm.

You screamed.

You were trapped in a tall glass tube and a scientist stared at you.

“This wouldn’t be necessary if you had just complied soldat. Why didn’t you comply?” Breaths repetitively caught in your throat, the sound of a heavy duty metal lid sealing the tube. “And until you learn to comply…”

The Winter Soldier, your soldat, was struggling against his chains trying to get to you - his crystalline eyes pulsating with anger. Two pairs of eyes locked as a shaky breath filled both your lungs.

Black things began to fall all around you, legs suddenly bursting from them as they covered you legs and the walls of the chamber. Screams tore from your throat as you body became alive with spiders assaulting every inch of your skin. Raging tears slashed your face as your body hyperventilated.

Your fists pounded at the glass, escapism the only thing on your mind. You shouts fell upon deaf ears as you knees began to shake.

Why didn’t you have your weapons? Why didn’t the Doctor save you?

The arachnids were continuing their assault, across your face, neck, back, legs, everywhere was covered by them.

Tears threatened slashed your face and your breathing teetered on the edge of hyperventilation, hoarse screaming coming from your mouth. You could feel the control slipping on your mind as the asset fought to attack the danger. Strong arms wrapped around you and pulled you away. Writhing and kicking you tried to get away whilst someone else was slapping at your arm, removing the beasts.

You sobbed, salty tears falling off your cheeks as the arms held you. Recognising Bucky’s voice next to your ear, you relaxed and curled desperately into his chest, his strong arms keeping you away from the floor.

“Alright, doll, it’s okay. We’re in Manhattan, New York; we’re a part of the Avengers; we are safe; HYDRA’s gone; your name is Y/N L/N.” Bucky repeated this over and over until you began to calm down and slow down your breathing but your legs stayed tightly locked around his hips.

The eerily silent room was at a stand still as your partner soothed your trembling form.

“Don’t you ever fucking think Stark!” Natasha was lashing out at the culprit as you fought back the mind control and flashbacks.

“How was I supposed to know it would trigger an episode?!”

Sam stepped in. “Wow, I don’t know, maybe because the pair are still recovering from PTSD caused by horrors that none of us can even imagine?”

“Alright Mr VA, chill with your logical reasoning.”

“This isn’t a joke Stark. You almost triggered her.” Bucky untangled himself so you could sit in the chair and he could stand up.

You rolled your puffy eyes. “It’s not a competition. Stark, you’re a fucking jerk. If you come anywhere near me for two weeks I will not hesitate to shoot you.”

Promptly, you turned around, grabbed Clint’s coffee and went back to your room to hibernate and watch YouTube videos about the best revenge pranks.

TAGLIST:

@nyxveracity @ariii287 @pointlesscasey @tahiti-island-dream @jayzayy @kapolisradomthoughts @curlycals @castellagreen @chipz4dayz @the-obsessive-fangirl @darkmelodies1 @saltymaddiee @lalalahgh @sammysgirl1997 @woofstar64 @marvel-lously @madamrubrum @ailynalonso15 @laqueus-ludovios @evyiione @steve-thotgers​ @in-the-potterhead-know ​ @ironspiderguy

reblog.comment:
Arachnophobia

Hi!

A small back story to this: when Steve found him, Bucky insisted on finding you as you were his partner at HYDRA and meant the world to him.

It had been two months since you had been moved to the tower and settling in hadn’t been easy. Bucky, of course, had been your light at the end of the tunnel through everything and making you realise that things could get better if you tried.

Stark and Barton had recently engaged in their monthly prank wars, which on this occasion involved almost the whole team. The intelligent members of the team (you, Natasha, Bruce and Bucky) were smartly staying out of the mess although as Bucky had discovered last time, that didn’t mean you were safe.

You rolled out of bed and pulled on a black tank top and leggings before going to brew your mandatory morning coffee. Natasha gave you an assassin smile in greeting and you returned it. You ignored everyone else in favour of grabbing your favourite mug that Bucky had given you. Indistinguishable whispering was coming from Tony and normally you would have a gun raised to his head but this life was different; you weren’t in constant danger anymore. You hit the toggle on the kettle and reached for the cupboard with the coffee in. You opened the cupboard as you checked your phone, tapping out a reply to an email from… You felt multiple things land on your arm causing you to drop your phone onto the side.

Spiders of varying sizes were crawling up your arm.

You screamed.

You were trapped in a tall glass tube and a scientist stared at you.

“This wouldn’t be necessary if you had just complied soldat. Why didn’t you comply?” Breaths repetitively caught in your throat, the sound of a heavy duty metal lid sealing the tube. “And until you learn to comply…”

The Winter Soldier, your soldat, was struggling against his chains trying to get to you - his crystalline eyes pulsating with anger. Two pairs of eyes locked as a shaky breath filled both your lungs.

Black things began to fall all around you, legs suddenly bursting from them as they covered you legs and the walls of the chamber. Screams tore from your throat as you body became alive with spiders assaulting every inch of your skin. Raging tears slashed your face as your body hyperventilated.

Your fists pounded at the glass, escapism the only thing on your mind. You shouts fell upon deaf ears as you knees began to shake.

Why didn’t you have your weapons? Why didn’t the Doctor save you?

The arachnids were continuing their assault, across your face, neck, back, legs, everywhere was covered by them.

Tears threatened slashed your face and your breathing teetered on the edge of hyperventilation, hoarse screaming coming from your mouth. You could feel the control slipping on your mind as the asset fought to attack the danger. Strong arms wrapped around you and pulled you away. Writhing and kicking you tried to get away whilst someone else was slapping at your arm, removing the beasts.

You sobbed, salty tears falling off your cheeks as the arms held you. Recognising Bucky’s voice next to your ear, you relaxed and curled desperately into his chest, his strong arms keeping you away from the floor.

“Alright, doll, it’s okay. We’re in Manhattan, New York; we’re a part of the Avengers; we are safe; HYDRA’s gone; your name is Y/N L/N.” Bucky repeated this over and over until you began to calm down and slow down your breathing but your legs stayed tightly locked around his hips.

The eerily silent room was at a stand still as your partner soothed your trembling form.

“Don’t you ever fucking think Stark!” Natasha was lashing out at the culprit as you fought back the mind control and flashbacks.

“How was I supposed to know it would trigger an episode?!”

Sam stepped in. “Wow, I don’t know, maybe because the pair are still recovering from PTSD caused by horrors that none of us can even imagine?”

“Alright Mr VA, chill with your logical reasoning.”

“This isn’t a joke Stark. You almost triggered her.” Bucky untangled himself so you could sit in the chair and he could stand up.

You rolled your puffy eyes. “It’s not a competition. Stark, you’re a fucking jerk. If you come anywhere near me for two weeks I will not hesitate to shoot you.”

Promptly, you turned around, grabbed Clint’s coffee and went back to your room to hibernate and watch YouTube videos about the best revenge pranks.

TAGLIST:

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: The Vengeance of a Dewdrop
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2zZKU6T

by argus

After Thor 2: Loki can’t shake the need to revenge himself on The Hulk for foiling his plans.
Neither Bruce nor Loki realize the damage yet to come.

Words: 619, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Thor (Movies)
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bruce Banner, Loki (Marvel), Erik Selvig, Tony Stark, Original Characters
  • Relationships: Bruce Banner/Loki
  • Additional Tags: Explicit Sexual Content, Blood and Gore, Medical Experimentation, Psychological Trauma, Mindfuck, Implied/Referenced Suicide, Murder, Character Death, Angst, Feelings, Porn with Feelings, Lots and lots of angst and feelings, Did I mention the angst and feelings?


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2zZKU6T

is that a thing? idk man

what I can’t do
